description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Grid Chasers is a multiplayer focused action game where players try knocking each other off a grid of blocks. Up to four players can compete for the gold while enjoying a fresh gameplay experience along with a wide variety of fantastic particle effects.
description.short: Grid Chasers is a multiplayer focused action game where players try knocking each other off a grid of blocks. Up to four players can compete for the gold while enjoying a fresh gameplay experience along with a wide variety of fantastic particle effects.
